name: A test

task.description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks

content:
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Wizards of the Coast/MTGA/MTGA.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: cd $CACHE && wget "$(curl --silent https://mtgarena-api.community.gl/forums/articles/58489/comments?page=1
      2>&1 | grep -m 1 -oP https.*?[.]msi |tail -1 | tr -d \\\\)"
- execute:
    command: cd $CACHE && find -name 'MTGAInstaller*.msi' -exec ln -s {} MTGAInstaller.msi
      \;
- task:
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- task:
    key: UseTakeFocus
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: faudio arial win10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $CACHE/mtg-arena/
    src: setup
- task:
    args: /i "$CACHE/MTGAInstaller.msi"
    description: Installing Magic the Gathering Arena
    exclude_processes: mscorsvw.exe rundll32.exe MTGA.exe UnityCrashHandler32.exe
    executable: msiexec
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  esync: true
